thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 15 of 474
thread.title: Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: When I had some confusion about my credit card and my order was canceled, I reordered and used the correct card information and increased the order. I got a personal call/message that ClearBags assumed this was a replacement order and that I no longer needed the one that was messed up. That was correct and I was impressed with the personal review of my orders. Thank you, ClearBags!
